name: ContactsValidate
description: All contacts specified in request will be validated against all domains specifed in "domains". As an alternative, you can also pass in tlds, with the exception of `uk`, which requires full domain names

X-Private-Label-Id.description: PrivateLabelId to operate as, if different from JWT

marketId.description: MarketId in which the request is being made, and for which responses should be localized

body.description: An instance document expected for domains contacts validation

**message**: Human-readable, English description of the error
